website_summaries.verdict: Stellar writing and a host of small improvements help Borderlands 2 stand tall on the shoulders of its predecessor.
pros: A ton of great mission writing and dialogueEnticing loot and experience rewardsIntriguing skill treesRich, inviting gameworld
cons: Spoken messages sometimes interrupt each otherOne character ability is not substantially different from the core gunplayInelegant split-screen save system

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite games
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it came out, just so I could play with my brother (who is several states over). The countless hours of enjoyment (and re-grinding after my PS3 got hosed...) were well worth the cost of a brand new game. Fun gameplay, easy-to-learn system, achievements and GUNS; what more could you ask for? If you're all-thumbs though, beware. My brother, while drunk, is more accurate than I am while *incredibly* sober using a PS3 controller. I'm fine on a mouse though! Go figure... I'd recommend all of the Borderlands games, especially BL2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best game of year
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love to play couch co-op games. We played through Borderlands #1 two time and was excited to get this #2. It is pretty much exactly the same as #1, but why mess with a great thing? We played this twice through and all of the downloadable content. Not appropriate for children, they say some crazy things.
customer_reviews.author: Accountant

customer_reviews.title: good game, consider the original
customer_reviews.text: First off can believe I got this game (used) for this price. Had to buy one since I switched consoles (Xbox to PS) only thing, before you buy. Please play the first one too :) for your own sake not mine. Its better in my opinion. Plus this game is a sequel of the first. (Just saying ;)) Both good games but this is a nice set and would be much more appreciated as such. That said, its a cool game , especially for you and a buddy or two to pack 20-40 hours into .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS GAME!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS GAME. Really, do it, now. This is one of those games that you can get lost in, spend hours and hours playing (all the while neglecting food, water, bathroom breaks, etc.) and still never lose the fun. The multiplayer brings this game to a whole new level (that is if you have friends) and the True Vault Hunter Mode makes the second (or third, or fourth, or fifth) playthrough just as fun if not more fun than the first! From the comic storyline to the bazillions of badass weapons, this game deserves a 6 star rating. BUY THIS GAME. Even if you don't have a PS3, just buy this game to bask in the glory of Borderlands 2.
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was more of a adventure game player- Legend of Zelda, Balder's Gate etc. I played a few FPS but overall not my thing. Then came Borderlands. They were the first (to my knowledge) to do a hybrid of 3 genres successfully-action/adventure, first person shooter and role playing game. I loved Borderlands and couldn't wait for Borderlands 2. I waited to review this until I had finished the first play through. I love this game. I like the new characters, the new landscapes to see, the different creatures and more of the story. I highly recommend this sequel!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Small Town Blues

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first borderlands game so was keen to try this new version and was thoroughly impressed. The gameplay is very familiar to the original so veterans can jump right in. Some interesting new characters, classes and locations keep things fresh however you'll soon find, once again, that it's all about the guns...lots and lots of guns. Ultimately not too difficult to solo on your own but the multiplayer element is where it's at. Great fun to be had in groups although soured a little by the open loot system. All in all a fantastic game.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Yay Boderlands
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say its Borderlands , its fun and action packed , it improves in just about every way possible from the first one and the first one was great game , so Borderlands 2 is just better in every way and so much fun , if you like shooters or if your looking to to try a shooter Borderlands is a must and you will have fun and if anything laugh at the cast there's some crazy characters Unique and very funny in this game . Fun Game .
customer_reviews.author: FunFact

customer_reviews.title: Mash up of Call of Duty and a comedy movie rolled up into one!! Great Game period
customer_reviews.text: Great game, think of Call of Duty with slapstick humor included. This game has it all, great first person shooter with RPG elements. This game has a great story line that will make you laugh and don't forget all of the side missions. Of course don't forget to get all the DLC with this game as this will give you many more hours of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: J.Petro

customer_reviews.title: Fun and crazy with your buddies!
customer_reviews.text: I played the first Borderlands and loved it instantaneously. The dark humor and ridiculous story line makes this one worth buying by far. The game is nicely balanced and constantly beckons you to continue playing day after day. It's even crazier-fun when you get a bunch of your buddies to play along. Music in the environments while running around is awesome and the inside jokes pulled from pop-culture and everything will guarantee a good chuckle or two. Not sure if I'll get the DLC's, but the game on its own will guarantee you a good time worth your dime.
customer_reviews.author: SpunkyDDog

customer_reviews.title: Love This Game
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed Borderlands. There were some complaints about the first games lack of story and there is definitely some merit to that. But for Borderlands 2 the producers took all of the complaints and gripes about the first game and used them as points for improvement. And I'd have to say they nailed it. This game is fantastic. The story is good the gameplay is fantastic. Plus how can you not get excited about your new FPS have 84 bazillion guns!
customer_reviews.author: Pantanga34

customer_reviews.title: if you liked the first this is a no brainer
customer_reviews.text: This game has all the good of the first one and improves on it in everyway....including getting rid of Brick as a worthless playable character. None of the characters from the first game are useable here. Instead they are all NPCs that drive and narrate the story. The new playable characters are great...and just wait for Tiny Tina....she is on crack and funny as hell. This game is one of the best all time if you love 2 player co op campaign.....1st person shooters....looting.....and humor.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Piggle

customer_reviews.title: Great game bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Game is great, had the digital version when this game was free for psn+ users but i got rid of that and lost the ability to play it, loaded all my saves i had before. only problem i had is that it came in a soft bubble wrap envelope and the case was cracked on the upper right corner, thank goodness the disc came undamaged. BTW this is a brand new game, was surprised for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kett

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game.I play games in the winter time to stay busy when I can't be outdoors and if you want something exciting and time-consuming this is it.Also you can download codes from some sites and get free golden keys.Wait until you level up before using them or they get wasted.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Slippin'Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: was great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriends as a gift. He wanted it to play online with one of his friends. He loves it. He likes the fact he can play with his friends on the ps3 even without having PS plus which we have anyway but some friends don't. He likes the gameplay and multiplayer. The graphics are good but not perfect. They're more a hand drawn type than other first person shooter games. Overall though this is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Angel C. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Borderland 2
customer_reviews.text: I really dig this game. I actually don't play much shooter and am not really into to them, but this game. I dig. I find the game play to be really fun and I think the voice acting is fantastic. Claptrap annoys the f*** out of me, which I appreciate, and the voice of handsome Jack makes me melt. Mmmmm evil. Anyways, I find it to be a lot of fun and visually pleasing with all the colors and such, and I have it for both PC and PS3 now.
customer_reviews.author: Serene Attaria

customer_reviews.title: One of the most fun games I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: One of the most fun games I've ever played. The endless loot is awesome, but can be a bit overwhelming. In every way it plays better than the original, which was also awesome, but did not feel quite as fresh. Still anyone who enjoys FSPs full of stylized sci-fi/fantasy violence will get their money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: ezra grey

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a GAME. One of my favs.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a GAME. One of my favs. Love this game series cant wait for another. This game got me after a few minutes of Borderlands 1. Part 2 continues the story with new characters bringing the original cast back in the storyline. Some Don't like the Graphics, so they hate on the Game but I do like the Graphics. This game is different from what I knew games to be till I played it. Sucked me in to it and never let go. I want more!!!
customer_reviews.author: EB12

customer_reviews.title: great Game
customer_reviews.text: ive had so much fun playing this game i bought it for the xbox1 as well with the presequal. its a great shooter just hard enough to be addictive but easy enough to not get stuck on easy mode and plenty difficult for the experenced gamer on expert mode.
customer_reviews.author: John J Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Original!
customer_reviews.text: The original Borderlands was fantastic. I enjoyed playing it so much that it became the first game I earned a platinum trophy in. The mesh of RPG elements with FPS gameplay was done very well and the developers put so much creativity into the characters and story. I've only been playing the sequel for a week and I can see that this game is very much like the original but is more polished. If you liked the original Borderlands, you'll love Borderlands 2. If you never played the original, give this one a shot. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I like to play shooters and rpg's and this game puts those elements together extremely well. I would rate the story 3 starts, but it makes up for it in other areas. What makes this game even better is that it doesn't CURSE 100 TIMES!! I am a Christian and the only reason I don't play a lot of games now a days is because of the Nudity and Profanity that these games have. I wouldn't say this game is perfect, but bearable. LOVE THIS GAME!! I RECOMMEND IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Addicting Game
customer_reviews.text: My main goal was to find a first-person-shooter that supports 2 player campaign (it does, split screen). At first I didn't care for the type of graphics used (Just wasn't use to it), but after playing it for a while, the graphics are great. The story line, gun selection, maps, various challenges, and commentary are enjoyable. The first night we played Borderlands 2, we played for 5 hours straight - and we're not gamers at all.
customer_reviews.author: theskyman

customer_reviews.title: Shoot n' Loot
customer_reviews.text: Welp, Gearbox did it. They one-up'd Borderlands with this super fun game. This is just a hassle free, shootin' & lootin' good time. The only big difference I felt with this sequel is, I've had more than enough. That isn't a bad thing. The first one left me wanting more, and this one rightfully satisfied my craving with a well rounded experience that smoothed out the Borderlands lore. There will be more sequels, but I'm in no hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this game
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game. This was my first time playing the borderlands series and it was a blast. I liked how arcadey it is. The RPG aspects of finding weapons and developing your character and very addictive. I played through the story 4 times with different types of characters and it was fresh each time. This is the first shooter that I've played the story multiple times. It is so fun and very exciting to find new loot.
customer_reviews.author: Junior R.

customer_reviews.title: Good game - just not as fun as the original
customer_reviews.text: I liked Borderlands 1 a lot. It was fun, fresh, and made me laugh at times. Borderlands 2 didn't seem to quite live up to it's predecessor. I played it and have almost finished it but don't have too much desire to get back to it and complete it. I know when I like a game when I try to get the platinum trophy. I won't be trying on this game - no replay-ability for me. I will alter my review if I finish and change my mind. Perhaps I'm just at a boring spot in the game right now.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the game..for once I found a game that gives her a challenge
customer_reviews.author: Michele Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: It just gets better
customer_reviews.text: The game picks up where it left off from the first. The graphics are virtually the same, which I wouldn't expect otherwise, but the added gun options and character enhancements make the game better. Besides gaining Level Up points, you now have Badass points that enhance your character as well. The Berzerker has changed from a fist-pounding fool to a double-packed weapon freak which I don't care for as well. But the new Commando character is cool. He packs a turret that can be leveled up throughout the game. This game is a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A Great Sequel
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this game!?!? Well I can say that it builds on the successful formula of the first one and takes it to a whole new level of Pandorian-Awesomeness! I can say that the use of new and old characters alike is spot on. I can also say that the humor is still very there and is a great part of the story. I am sure many reviewers will describe the game-play and all that..All I will say is GET THE GAME! If you aren't sure about getting it..try the 1st one, it's low priced now and is a great way to get into Borderlands!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perez

customer_reviews.title: Unce Unce Unce Unce! Get down!
customer_reviews.text: This game is unbelievably amazing. I beat it a few years back but I feel like I rushed through it. Upon returning to another playthrough I have to say this is in my top 10 games. The story is incredible, the music is exhilarating, and the smooth gameplay is phenomenal. I highly recommend this to anyone that enjoys humorous and explosive first person shooters.
customer_reviews.author: UvaroviteKing

customer_reviews.title: Cartoon violence is ok
customer_reviews.text: This game reminds me of Skyrim, with its open environment. You can tackle the main quest path, or take care of all the side quests first. Either way, it is joy when games of the variety arrive on the scene. I swear to myself to go to bed at 11 PM - next thing I know it is 2 AM! Be warned! This is addictive! Productivity will suffer! If you're married - be careful, you'll be accused of having an affair!
customer_reviews.author: Wally D. Carbo

customer_reviews.title: Great service and game
customer_reviews.text: As an avid PlayStation 3 player I find it better to buy used games rather than new ones, and I am pleased to say I have not encountered a dud yet. This video games served to that a testament, I received the video game in a timely manner (three days) and had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new copy and that’s exactly what I got. The game loaded up and worked just as it should.
customer_reviews.author: shawbert72

customer_reviews.title: I AM ZERO THE ASSASSIN
customer_reviews.text: -----Please don't give me these stinking time limit quests. As my name implies--I like to sneak in or use my sniper rifle. I want to come in from behind and take them out with bare hands. If you want to give me a job to deliver the mail give me all the time I need as I do for my snail mail in real life just don't fail me for not rushing in with guns blazing, it's just not my style.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M. Shuford

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend LOVES this game
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got Borderlands (the first one) last summer and has had several months of fun with it, so I knew this would be a good Christmas present for him, It helps him zone out after a long day at work. Personally, I never cared for games where you shoot things, and he's not a big fan either, but he's really gotten into this one. He even got the extension packs for the first one. He loves the Scooter character, especially.
customer_reviews.author: NeonPinkSheep

customer_reviews.title: Fun to be had
customer_reviews.text: A total new look at the first person shooter genre. Everything is kind of like cell shaded. What just nails this fun game is the fresh new game play and weapon diversity. You will be just mesmerized at how you are constantly discovering new game play styles and new weapons. a must play!the foes you gundown and their chatter are just hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: smc

customer_reviews.title: Couch Co-OP!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I, purchased Borderlands 1, so obviously after some time we bought Borderlands 2. I could go into great detail about the gameplay, and glitches, but I feel that is better suited for someone more qualified. We play Only Couch Co-OP and the only downside is, you need a big TV for it. If you liked the first one, you will like this as well. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sodi Pop

customer_reviews.title: Better than the first? Hard to say
customer_reviews.text: Game is really addictive, and expanded from the first. I personally like the first, but I am finding this change ok. This game is better with multiplayer, wether with someone in the same room, or via online. It is bosses you can not defeat by yourself, I have tried a couple and have had headaches with them. Overall great, rude humor, I wouldn't recommend for young kids, maybe like 15 16 year old being bloody and cursing.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Normally not a fan of this style of graphics for video games, but became attached quickly to Borderlands. With Borderlands 2, gave it a shot and it is as good as the original. Good storyline, exciting weapons and upgrades, etc. Even went and bought the Season Pass just to get added missions. Although I enjoy it, and recommend it, the wife hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Elf

customer_reviews.title: Fixes all the Issues of the first game
customer_reviews.text: Although I did enjoy myself with the first Borderlands, there was a lot that annoyed me - lack of plot and voice acting, repetitive enemies, similar guns, monotonous landscape, unusable vehicles. All of this has been addressed in what is perhaps the most fun shooter I've ever played. It's laugh out loud funny, provides diverse enemies, landscapes, and weapons, and really fun skill trees that exceed the first game in every possible way.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure other's have provided in-depth reviews. I'll just say that this is one of the few games I've played all the way through. That is saying a lot, because I don't finish many. I simply become bored with them at some point. But, not with Borderlands 2. I also finished Borderlands. Two of the best video games I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: PS3 videogame came in very good condition, exactly as described. Thank you so much. Anyone looking for older PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360 games should seriously consider this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z

customer_reviews.title: Glitch
customer_reviews.text: The game is overall good. But it seems a glitch towards the end of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A few years old, still worth a play
customer_reviews.text: Borderlands 2 has had some DLC and is clearly not the 'new good game', but it ages pretty well. For the price gives you a few great hours of a FPS/RPG and its actually pretty fun to play with friends if you have extra controllers. Would recommend for anyone looking for a good time at a low budget.
customer_reviews.author: Whoistcmt

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS GAME!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could give BL2 more than 5 stars. I play this every morning before work and every night after. I literally spend more time with this then i do with my wife. Which is odd since she plays too...... Anyway, If you haven't played this game your in for a treat. Theres so much to do and eso much to explore and collect and kill and blow up and level up, then kill some more! YOU. WILL. LOVE. IT!
customer_reviews.author: BigT_11B

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very good at first or third person shooter games and need a good story to stay engaged. I got this at the recommendation of a friend and I'm so glad I went out of my 'gaming comfort zone' to try it. The graphics of this game are amazing, the characters are interesting and hilarious, and it's just a ton of fun. I love this game and I'm so happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Rubio

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Every second of playing this game is pure enjoyment. When you are not laughing your butt off at the comedic situations you are simply immersed in the epic game play. I've had this game for weeks and I haven't beaten it yet which means that the story line is a lot longer than the original. I highly recommend this game to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best game I've ever owned just had to buy it again cause my grandson wanted mine.
customer_reviews.author: pascual rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good with friends
customer_reviews.text: I liked the music during some of the play through as well as the multiplayer, you can play through 5 different character types which each character utilizes a different set of strengths which help them progress through the games. Although some missions seem repetitive their is always something new to see as well as different music for all the maps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! Lots to explore and enemies to kill with the ridiculous amount of weapons at you're disposal. Playable characters are unique enough with their individual skill tree builds that easily offers a player multiple playthroughs of the game on different difficulty levels to test how've you progressed as a player or even more fun with friends for better loot drops.
customer_reviews.author: hotine

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: I love Borderlands a little disappointed in the 2nd one I felt it is completely shorter than the first but it is still pretty awesome. I hope they come out with another one. My bf hates the fact that I am better than he is at playing this. I spend hours playing this
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: SWEEET
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for people who love shooting games but are tired of the old call of duty crap..think FPS meets RPG. lots of guns to collect and upgrade. sweet graphics and great gameplay .An improvement in every way on what the original borderlands brought.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee K. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: It is overall a fun and enjoyable game
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this game. He has had it for 3 years and still plays it. He loves to play with friends and I have even played as well. It is overall a fun and enjoyable game.
customer_reviews.author: damageless

customer_reviews.title: It's very fun, and you'll want to pull out your hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I just beat this game. It's very fun, and you'll want to pull out your hair at the same time. I used a faq, and it recommended using Axton for a first-time playthrough. That was great advice, as the Sabre Turret killed about half my enemies for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: borderlands2
customer_reviews.text: This new borderlands 2 is alot better then the first game. If you get your golden keys do not use them until you are a higher level you will get better guns if you wait. I have been playing this game alot it is hard to put down. Also if you order it from amazon dont get the free super saver shipping, it took almost 10 days to get to me and i pre ordered it. My brother ordered his got two day shipping and was playing the game before i ever got mine. Next time im getting 2 day shipping ..
customer_reviews.author: Ducktazz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game! Lots of fun, and multiplayer just makes it better!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed BL1, and played with some family members a bit - got BL2 and love it. The new classes are a lot of fun, similar yet better than the last ones. Some of the controls have been enhanced, which is great. I love playing this game multiplayer, as it's a lot more fun to go do some of the quests in groups. Also a bit easier :-)
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, Extremely fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I got two-day shipping on this game and it showed up the next afternoon. I appreciate it when people go above expectations, and this vendor did just that. As for the game itself, you can read the official reviews, but I highly recommend it for parents that have kids that enjoy coop 1st person shooters.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Matthews

customer_reviews.title: The bad guys still scream out insults and your character is ...
customer_reviews.text: The Kid talked me into buying this game and with the price I couldn't say no. It is rated M, though there's an option in the settings to turn off the gore. The bad guys still scream out insults and your character is still shooting people, but it's not hyper-realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Kingsley

customer_reviews.text: At first it was a very difficult game, but later when i kept playing and leveled up my character more, he became so beast, then the game became more addicting. lol which is a good thing.. Btw I disliked borderlands 1 because i hated the graphics, but now I supposed I gave this one a chance since it had such good ratings. Great game
customer_reviews.author: Dj Leacock

customer_reviews.title: great multiplayer online campaign
customer_reviews.text: i suggest getting the first version of this game. if you like that then you will probably love this one. everything got better...graphics, gameplay, online interaction with other players, matchmaking, guns, loot, story. all around a nice upgrade from v1. i'll probably be getting the expansion pack as well.
customer_reviews.author: Samwize the brave

customer_reviews.title: If you like borderland 1 your going love Borderland 2
customer_reviews.text: If you like borderland 1 your going love Borderland 2. They listen to the fan and gave us what we ask for. Graphics are amazing. Weapons customization is boundless and endless. Characters and fun and dialogue is funny!!
customer_reviews.author: PhoBoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved borderlands 1 and so far love borderlands 2. Right when you think you have everything under control they throw something new at you. Love getting to see some of the old characters and love seeing the new ones they came up with. Highly recommended for a first person shooter game that isnt a COD game.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Changed my perspective!
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate first person shooters. It was always something about the perspective that didn't appeal to me and I would always find self getting bored with the game before I finished half of it. Not this time. Boarder Lands 2 has officially changed my perspective on first person games. This one is tons of fun and I actually the game play. Honestly, I'm addicted. I got a total of seven brand new games this holiday, all of them top notch and the hottest games of the season, but I can't keep my hands off boarder lands!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not as good as the last one
customer_reviews.text: Good. Not as good as the last one, but was still fun to play. Just wish they would stop nerfing things.
customer_reviews.author: Vicious

customer_reviews.title: Best FPS
customer_reviews.text: One of the best first-person-shooters I've ever played. Think diablo with guns as far as the game's mechanics go. Hilarious dialogue and extremely replayable its hands down one of the best games I've ever played. Gameplay: 10 Story: 8 Graphics: Comic book graphics and never made any claims of being something more so you should know what youre getting into; 10
customer_reviews.author: mistur_owl

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I've ever played. The first Borderlands was good for shooting and looting, while story took a back seat. With their second effort, Gearbox has really stepped up their game- retaining the good from the first while improving on nearly every poor aspect. The writing and story are both much improved. Gameplay is still top notch, and it is a lot of fun leveling up your character. I would highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Lac21

customer_reviews.title: Looting is addicting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a lot of fun playing this game. Especially with my friends, we all bought it and are playing it together. But even single player is fun. Looting is just addicting. You will want to continue playing to get that super powerful gun or the next skill point. It's worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Better Borderlands
customer_reviews.text: If you liked the first one, you'll love this one. There is still some back tracking but not nearly like the first one. Playing alone is an okay experience but playing online with some friends is the way to go. I haven't done any of the DLC but the stand alone game is worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Hours of your life = GONE! But it was fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent (probably) WAY too much time playing this game but it was worth every second. I had a great time playing through on both single player and with helping my cousins and friends grind on MP. The DLCs are not mandatory by any means but were nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wells

customer_reviews.title: Borderlans 2 On the Border of greatness?
customer_reviews.text: More of the same. Some times that is a bad thing. Not here. Action RPG in the guise of a shooter. Comedy, if you are into it. Really great co-op, four man action going on. I could write this more like an true critique, but I am watching TV. Great game though. If you enjoy shooting things and loot based RPG action, you can't go wrong here. Diablo, with gunZ (see that Z?).
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: If you want to have a great co-op game to play with friend then I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have a great co-op game to play with friend then I recommend this to you, if you want a good singleplayer then I say take another look at the game and consider it, because it really shines when playing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: stf92

customer_reviews.title: I Heart This Game
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of the first Borderlands, then hell yes you need to get this game. It's everything the first game was and then some. A lot some. I feel like the story was a lot longer. There's more action. And damn, the difficulty was even raised a bit. Love the fact that you can play split screen even online with more people. This allows my girlfriend and I to play together online with our other friends.
customer_reviews.author: Burrosito

customer_reviews.title: Every Bit as Fun as the First
customer_reviews.text: and even better looking. This game has everything youd expect from the Franchise. This is a must have. A bunch of adult humor in this one, just make sure you know that before you play it in front of children. Thats all im saying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoot and loot
customer_reviews.text: A great shooter with plenty of humor. There are many side missions you can do and also invite your friends to play through your campaign with you. Graphics are very nice. If you enjoy a good shooter with some humor then this is definitely a good pick
customer_reviews.author: Gipsy Danger

customer_reviews.title: Best FPS of 2012!
customer_reviews.text: Nowadays most of the FPS games out there focus on their multi-player and give a poor campaign experience but Borderlands 2 shows us that a FPS game doesn't have to copy games like COD to be successful. This game is funny as hell and there are so MANY weapons that you will never get tired of playing this game and if you do the game can be played with friends. If you can I would recommend buying the season pass so you can get the dlcs! They are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Andres I.

customer_reviews.title: Old, but still great!
customer_reviews.text: old, but still a great game. It's fun to do a co-op on this game. I will say that I liked the characters in the first Borderlands better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Best Game ever!
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I loved playing this game! The Cop-Op split screen is awesome. We could both run around and do our own thing - you are not tied down to a dominate players screen. The challenges are hard, but not too intense. This game is also HUGE! Totally value for money.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: HEYYYOOOH
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love everything about it. I loved the first (eventhough I'm not a big first person shooter guy) and was excited for this second, it does not disappoint. It's got good variation for the environments, GREAT script writing, cool new weapons, its long and a hell of alot of fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing this for the past month with my boyfriend and we still can't really get enough. Not a great story, not great graphics but other two player game with someone you enjoy springtime with its great!
customer_reviews.author: King00082

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Hugh content, different game with each character you choose to be, many hours of play compared to Call of duty games which are great but can be completed in short time for those not into online play. Highly recommend, only con was a couple of glitches when I had to restart the game to get it to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great game.  Lots of DLC.
customer_reviews.text: This game goes on and on with wonderful game-play, great designs and guns that go PEW PEW PEW! After you've finished the single player story-line, which is considerable, you can start downloading some really fun DLC to keep the explosions going.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elb

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Action and shooting is really nice especially the storyline and I can see a lot of work went into the game. Must buy for any ps3 owner
customer_reviews.author: NJ1021

customer_reviews.title: i'm loving it
customer_reviews.text: It's a challenging game which i love and it's all in daytime unlike BL1. I play mostly 2 now and the background is easy for me and I like playing all 5 classes. Sometimes it will freeze up but not often and i just have to restart the system. I wish we had more bag and bank space.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D

customer_reviews.title: amazing game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hope of getting a game that would provide me hours upon hours of playtime, and a great first person shooter. It did just that. The variety of guns in this game, the art style, the bosses and enemies, and the characters are all fantastic. The co-op is fun as well. The only minor flaw I have in this game is that sometimes the enemies can be way too strong for your level, of course, this leads to grinding, which can be a bit of a pain. But once you find that perfect weapon or reach that high level, it's all major fun from there
customer_reviews.author: Henry Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if the 15 year old who asked for the game would really enjoy it I catch him often playing it (more than I would have thought) The story seems interesting, I often catch myself watching the boys in the house play it
customer_reviews.author: MissTatajana

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the first...
customer_reviews.text: This is such an upgrade from the first Borderlands. Everything is better, frame rate, HUD, menu system, character skill trees, you name it and they've Improved it. You won't regret buying this, also it's a blast to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: BlindArchangel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the classics. Game was like brand new when I got it.. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Radico

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun with this one. Tons of loot,tons of quests,cool story,and possibly the coolest villian in any game. Well worth the price of admission!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for Christmas and he said he likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Great multiplayer game. Lots of action and adventure. Great follow up to the first game. Played through 4 times already and can't wait to play through with all the DLC.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great FPS
customer_reviews.text: Can't put this game down, many hours invested. Already on my second run through. My only complaint is that TVHM is very difficult with only one person, almost forcing you to team play which I don't really want to do.
customer_reviews.author: NS resident

customer_reviews.title: Damaged material
customer_reviews.text: So I have recieved my game today. I love Borderlands, but I recieved my game in the mail with a broken box on every corner. I domt dare to open it and it would not let me contact whoever sent this out. Its still in its casing to prove...
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Met All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Borderlands 2 is the first game that I have ever preordered, and it was well worth the wait. I stumbled upon the original Borderlands last year and that was easily one of the most fun games I have ever played. With Borderlands 2 they took what was successful and really capitalized on it. The story line has been great so far, being both funny and entertaining. The game play is great and it is nice to see enemy characters attempt to avoid being hit; taking cover, rolling, etc. I have not completed the game yet, but so far so good and I am very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: as good as the first. though i beat it on PS3, i ended up buying it on PC and i prefer it there. it is an awesome game for couch coop with my girlfriend though, and she loves this game!
customer_reviews.author: hoof_hearted4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game
customer_reviews.text: Even if you are not a fan of shooters, (COD, MOH, etc.) this game is fun!! I don't like the other shooters but I have already logged hours of gameplay on this one. I have beaten the game twice with one character and am now going back through it with another and can foresee having to do it with every character type.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Werner

customer_reviews.title: Most Fun I've Had
customer_reviews.text: Most fun I've had in a game in a long time. Great story for single player. Amazazazing multiplayer. New customizations are great. You like guns, well there are so many different kinds and types of guns, mods, grenades, firing styles, explosions, you name it!! The new AI system makes it seem like I'm actually fighting a psychopathic , bloodlusting buzz saw wielding crackhead and not a robot. Most fun I've had in a game in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Tannahill

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: With near perfect polish, acting and graphics for the design of the game, B2 surpasses expectations. My only difficulty was in aiming to open and pick up items. Played on both Xbox and PS3, getting in the right exact spot for that was troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: Demosthenes

customer_reviews.title: If you liked BL1 you will like this as much or more
customer_reviews.text: If you liked BL1 you will like this as much or more. The back pack is easier to navigate thru. I still play it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop playing!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love Borderlands! From start to finish its storyline keeps you entertained with so many challenges. Found myself (ashamedly!) playing for 4-5 hour intervals unknowingly! Awesome, Awesome game - hurry up and buy!
customer_reviews.author: ske1ator

customer_reviews.title: Play with my brother, lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This game has a funny script, loot, great gameplay, loot, impossible boss fights (DLCs), loot, more balanced classes compared to BL1, loot, and, did I say loot? PS: It really has a ton of loot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend excellent product, I am satisfied with the same quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: Good story line, cynical characters, new enemies, and tons of guns make this a rather fun game. If your looking for something groundbreaking in terms of control or game play, you won't find it, but it's a blast to play!
customer_reviews.author: Hoodwink

product_meta.title: Borderlands 2 - Playstation 3
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation 3| Edition:StandardBorderlands 2 furthers the distinct blending of First Person Shooter and Role Playing genres to create the true evolution of the Role Playing Shooter. Team up with up to three other players for four-player online goodness or go old-school with two-player split-screen couch sharing mayhem as you spend hours leveling up your character and equipping them with one of the millions of badass weapons. Borderlands 2 features a new visually stunning array of procedurally generated guns, shields, grenades, artifacts, enemies and more. Choose one of the four new character classes to be taken through a carefully crafted and connected story to all new and surprising environments across the living planet of Pandora. Make new friends, arm them to the teeth and fight alongside them on your relentless quest for revenge and redemption.

AMAZON.COM



 Borderlands 2 is a hybrid First-Person Shooter, RPG game focused on over-the-top co-op play, and set in the open-world game environment of the planet Pandora. The second game in the game series, Borderlands 2 raises the 'loot and shoot' action of the original game with an even larger and more detailed world to explore, an updated gun system, a new cast of characters and character classes, and integration of storyline with action. 





The over-the-top 'loot and shoot' action of the Borderlands game universe returns with a new characters and character classes.
View larger 

OVER-THE-TOP 'SHOOT AND LOOT' ACTION RETURNS
 Borderlands 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed and best selling role-playing-shooter hybrid, once again delivers its unique flavor, characters and addictive nonstop collaborative loot-shoot gameplay. As in the original game, Borderlands 2 features an openworld game environment, but this time around the world players experience is larger and packed with more depth at all levels. The game features an all-new cast of characters, skills, environments, enemies, weapons, and equipment that come together in a carefully crafted and connected story. Make new friends, arm them to the teeth and fight alongside them on a relentless quest for revenge and redemption through the undiscovered and unpredictable living world of Pandora. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * All-New Characters and Classes - Choose from all new characters and classes including the Gunzerker, who can dual-wield any two weapons in the game. Dual machine guns? Cool. Dual rocket launchers? Of course. Dual sniper rifles? sure, if that’s your thing.
 * Play Online with Friends - Share your adventures with friends both online and via LAN through a seamless system enabling you to drop in and drop out of a campaign without ever having to restart the game.
 * World Connected Story - Left for dead in the frozen tundra of Pandora, begin your quest of revenge and redemption as the story drives you closer to the Hyperion Corporation and its evil founder, handsome Jack.
 * New Badass Gun System - Millions upon millions of possible weapons means tons of new and innovative ways to engage foes on Pandora. Fire, electricity, corrosive acid, and more will all be at your disposal.
 * 87 Bazillion...Everything - It's not just guns on Pandora, you will lust after procedurally generated shields, grenades, alien artifacts, class mods and much, much more.
 * Brand-new Environments - From the arctic tundra, through the dangerous grasslands, past the mysterious corrosive caverns to beyond, discover more of the unpredictable world of Pandora at every turn.
 * Brand-new Enemies - Hulking, gorilla-like Bullymongs, vicious predatory stalkers and the hyperion mechanical army, run by handsome Jack, are just some of the new enemies you will face.

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
feature_bullets: Brand new environments on Pandora: Hunt through entirely brand new areas of Pandora that are more alive than ever!

87 Bazillion Everything: In addition to the new gun system, you will lust after procedurally generated shields, grenades, Alien Artifacts, class mods and much, much more. And you thought the original Borderlands had a ton of loot!
World Connected Story: You will find yourself left for dead in the frozen tundra of Pandora as you begin your quest of revenge and redemption.

Dynamic Co-op online, split-screen and LAN: Share your adventures with friends both online and via LAN. Borderlands 2 features a seamless system enabling you to drop in and drop out of a campaign without ever having to restart the game.
New Badass Gun System: An entirely new take on the groundbreaking procedural system means millions upon millions of possible weapons. The variety and style of guns in Borderlands 2 is staggering.
Choose from all new characters and classes including the Gunzerker, who can dual-wield any two weapons in the game
Share your adventures with friends both online and via LAN with a seamless co-op system enabling you to drop in and drop out of a campaign without ever having to restart the game
Improved story integration which finds you left for dead in the frozen tundra of Pandora as you begin your quest of revenge and redemption
An entirely new take on the groundbreaking procedural system means millions upon millions of possible weapons
In addition to the new gun system, players lust after procedurally generated shields, grenades, alien artifacts, class mods and much, much more
